name: Skyhook
description: Fight with grappling hooks in this party brawler for one to four players. Play as a treasure hunting cat or a land swimming shark as you swing around the stage taking out your opponents.
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows XP (SP2) or later Processor: 1.66 GHz Dual Core Processor or equivalent Memory: 1 GB RAM Graphics: Intel HD Graphics or equivalent Storage: 300 MB available space Additional Notes: Gamepad highly recommended

reviews.review_text: Grappling hook death match, need I say more?   One of the most intense couch multiplayer games I've played. Highly recommended!

It's a bit of a stretch to claim that this game has local co-op. The quest mode is single player only. You can play arena games with 2 players on the same team against bots, but that is not really the same thing.
